EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Neo4J Technology 10AM.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Neo4j Technology
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Neo4j Technology with Michael Hunger, Neo Technology and Josh Long, Pivotal. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, May 20, 2014
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, UTC-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=661022264>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195617&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 661 022 264
Thank you,
